author: jstrachan
msg: Modified webapp build system so that it appears to work fine with the J2EE SDK

author: jstrachan
msg: Added support for ConnectionConsumer and ServerSessionPool for multithreaded processing of topics or queues

author: jstrachan
msg: Added support for the creation of MessageConsumer objects as well as adding a helper class, MessageConsumerThread which allows messages to be consumed in a thread

author: jstrachan
msg: Fixed Ant build process so that the JUnit tests can run properly against the J2SDKEE installation - included all the nasty J2EE system properties that have to be set to be able to run an application against it

author: jstrachan
msg: Got the basic MDO web-app working thanks to the use of a jms-ri.jar build target to create just a JMS reference implementation JAR which can be used inside a web-app in Tomcat.
